guaraní mythology

Free REST API to practice and prototyping.

Guide
MethodRoutesParameter
GET/v1/myths/--
GET/v1/myths/name/:name( require name )
GET/v1/myths/:id( require id )
POST/v1/myths/:id( require id )
PUT/v1/myths/:id( require id )
DELETE/v1/myths/:id( require id )

Example

fetch('https://guarani-myths.up.railway.app/v1/myths/1')
  .then(res => res.json())
  .then(data => console.log(data))

Response

{
  "id": 1,
  "name": "Taú and Keraná",
  "description": "This causes deep sadness and...",
  "image": "https://guarani-myths.up.railway.app/images/...",
}

See the PenExample ( Fetching data from api )by Emilio Romero (@emrocode) onCodePen.

Reference

Paraguay Myths. (2022) Retrieved from Municipality of Yaguarón https://www.yaguaron.gov.py/mitos-del-paraguay/

server status
